validationRules.errorMessage: To end the process with an acceptance of the report to the client, you must send the PMD to approve
validationRules.name: Aceptado

validationRules.errorMessage: You must attach the report resulting from the RDP in the indicated format
validationRules.name: Estatus_RDP_Completado

validationRules.errorMessage: You must indicate the reason for rejection
validationRules.name: Etapa_Rechazado

validationRules.errorMessage: You must indicate the reason for the return and describe it
validationRules.name: Etapa_insuficiente

validationRules.errorMessage: Before proceeding with the first review you must declare and attach the report to the client
validationRules.name: GI_a_1RA_REV

validationRules.errorMessage: If you do not have enough information to conduct out the investigation, you must select the "Insufficient" stage
validationRules.name: Insuficiencia_de_Informacion

validationRules.errorMessage: Before proceeding you must complete those responsible for the investigation process
validationRules.name: Nuevo_a_RevisionDeInformacion

validationRules.errorMessage: You cannot continue to the first stage of review, you must send to approve the investigation
validationRules.name: Proceso_de_aprobacion_1

validationRules.errorMessage: Before proceeding to the PMD review you must send to approve the JGC and GC
validationRules.name: Segunda_revision

validationRules.errorMessage: You cannot continue without marking the RDP as completed
validationRules.name: ValidacionRDP
